values: Say anything you want anonymously in this post.

Reply and I'll give you a letter. Find ten songs that start with that letter and post them to your journal. 

Mine is the letter N

1. Nothing is Too Wonderful to be True - Dirty Rotten Scoundrels
2. Now (It's Just the Gas) - Little Shop of Horrors
3. New Music - Ragtime
4. No Good Deed - Wicked
5. No One is Alone - Into the Woods
6. Nowadays - Chicago
7. Number 918 - Altar Boyz
8. No Time at All - Pippin
9. Nobody Needs to Know - Last Five Years
10. Notice Me, Horton - Seussical the Musical

Put your entire MP3 collection on shuffle, list a lyric from the first 25 songs that play, have your friends identify the songs. Guess. 1. he's handsome, he's young, alright he's 62 Matchmaker - Fiddler on the Roof 2. and began what they came here to do, which was essentially to eat cleveland, and des moine, and peoria, and new york Don't Feed the Plants - Little Shop of Horrors 3. some take a lifetime, mine take a minute My New Philosophy - You're a Good Man, Charlie Brown 4. so much for the streetlights, they're never gonna guide you home Big Sur - The Thrills 5. sometimes i wish our differences weren't real 6. we'll be present at the birth of old faith looking new Morning Glow - Pippin 7. i just want you for my own, more than you can ever know All I Want For Christmas - Mariah Carey 8. tell him he played a great game, tell him you liked his article in the newspaper Popular - Nada Surf 9. not in my backyard utensils, go back to china Over the Moon - Rent 10. some were born with rags and patches but we use dollar bills for matches Elegance - Hello Dolly 11. you were everything i wanted, but i just can't finish what i started My Friends Over You - New Found Glory 12. we all take a bow, including the cow, though business is lousy and slow Together Wherever we Go - Gypsy 13. we got a lot of what it takes to get along We're in the Money - 42nd Street 14. the first one came on a tuesday afternoon when i first saw you Get a Clue - Simon and Milo 15. it must have been so bad, cause living with me must have damn near killed you How You Remind Me - Nickelback 16. we are led to those who help us most to grow For Good - Wicked 17. they said they wouldn't make it, they didn't make it 18. give me two eyes of blue softly saying i need you All I Care About - Chicago 19. but if the hunger's still there, buried somewhere inside, covered up by the boredom we've been trying to hide 20. the bad guys know us and they leave us alone I Get Around - Beach Boys 21. you know you'll never be lonely with you-know-who One - A Chorus Line 22. no one's gonna drag you up to get into the light where you belong The Sign - Ace of Base 23. i like it, they like it, this two for one Two Ladies - Cabaret 24. i'm simply laying down the facts for you Run, Freedom, Run - Urinetown 25. go ahead and take a picture, and hang it up so you can tear me down Bouncin' Off the Walls - Sugarcult

I had the most insane fuckin' dream just now.

There was a whole really funny part taking place in Target, but this part was just ridiculous.

I was with Lauren Neller and we walked into my school and the gym had collapsed and we had to be really careful about balancing the floor so it didn't cave anymore and so we didn't get hurt. Anyway, we had to slide down this grass track on pillows or something like that and I ended up separated from Lauren, and then insanity began. Everyone was sitting on bleachers and looking over at the school (I think we were looking at Mountainview) and lightening struck the building's windows two at a time three or four times. There were 2 windows that were struck repeatedly and then shattered. We could hear the people there yelling for everyone to get back from the windows. I was so scared I was grabbing the arm of the person next to me even though I didn't know who it was (turned out to be Melissa Weiss). So then it started storming really badly. I was in a van with some people being taken back to school. Lightening was hitting everywhere. Buildings were getting completely destroyed. There was a tv-like thing in the car and it had graphics like on NES and it was a map of the school and it showed how electrified everything was and how buildings just kept sending out random sparks, but they were a lot bigger than sparks, they were like actual shooting bolts. The buildings looked fried. People were talking about how the lightning was brown. (? it's apparently a really bad type of lightning)We were wondering if they were going to end the semester early and send everyone home. (this took place the day before finals start.) We got back to school and I grabbed my jacket out of the trunk and ran into the Union (which looked nothing like the union. hi dreams.) but then realized it wasn't my jacket so I ran back out and the van was gone and they said they would give my jacket back to me when they send vans/cars/buses to take everyone home.

MORAL: scary fucking dream.

put your mp3 player on shuffle, post lyrics to the first 20 songs that come up and have your friends guess the artist and the song.

GO FOR IT

i am very sick with a very ridiculously bad cold. i can't breathe. my throat hurts. my head hurts. even in my dreams i have a bad cold. it's bad. it needs to go away. right now. sick or not, i'm going saturday. yay for saturday.
